mapper.insert: insert into todo_mst values( 0, #{todo_content}, 0, #{importance_flag}, now(), now() )
mapper.select:
select tm.todo_code,
tm.todo_content, tm.todo_complete, tm.importance_flag,
tt.total_count,
tm.create_date, tm.update_date from todo_mst tm LEFT OUTER JOIN (select COUNT(*) AS total_count from todo_mst) tt ON (1=1) order by todo_code desc limit #{index},#{count}
